text: The Croatian Football Federation (, HNS) is the governing body of football in Croatia. It is in charge of the men's and the women's national teams. The association was founded in 1912. It became a member of FIFA in 1992 and UEFA in 1993. It is based in the capital Zagreb. title: Croatian Football Federation
